LanguageData.OE_Armagon.label: armagon
LanguageData.OE_Armagon.description: Obsidias Armagons are huge insectoids with tough obsidian chitin. These insectoids themselves are very peaceful, but they will be able to protect themselves from any predator or hunter without any problems. Their strength allows them to carry huge loads, which makes them excellent pack animals.
LanguageData.OE_Armagon.tools.horn.label: horn
LanguageData.OE_Armagon.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.OE_Direwolf.label: direwolf
LanguageData.OE_Direwolf.description: Obsidias Direwolves look like normal wolves, but these creatures are nearly twice the size. Because of their fur, they prefer to live in cool climates. Hard to tame, but once tamed, they become loyal protectors.
LanguageData.OE_Direwolf.tools.left_claw.label: left claw
LanguageData.OE_Direwolf.tools.right_claw.label: right claw
LanguageData.OE_Direwolf.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.OE_Raptor.label: raptor
LanguageData.OE_Raptor.description: Obsidias Raptors are large, aggressive theropods, but seem to be very intelligent for beasts. These theropods prefer to live in warmer climates. Difficult but accessible to taming, which makes these fast and deadly predators an excellent fighting unit.
LanguageData.OE_Raptor.tools.left_foot_claw.label: left foot claw
LanguageData.OE_Raptor.tools.right_foot_claw.label: right foot claw
LanguageData.OE_Raptor.tools.left_arm_claw.label: left arm claw
LanguageData.OE_Raptor.tools.right_arm_claw.label: right arm claw
LanguageData.OE_Tionant_Blue.label: tionant (blue)
LanguageData.OE_Tionant_Blue.description: Tionants are the scourge of Obsidia. In ancient times, these creatures terrorized the entire planet, the ancient Obsidia humans worshiped them as gods, but several thousand years ago they disappeared without a trace... But suddenly, a hundred years ago, these creatures again declared themselves. Continuing their terror on the planet. The reason for their disappearance and reappearance is not yet clear, since the Tionantes are very difficult to study.\n\nBut despite all this, Tionants have one useful feature. Blue Tionants produce a healing jelly with their bodies.
LanguageData.OE_Tionant_Blue.tools.left_claw.label: left claw
LanguageData.OE_Tionant_Blue.tools.right_claw.label: right claw
LanguageData.OE_Tionant_Blue.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.OE_Tionant_Green.label: tionant (green)
LanguageData.OE_Tionant_Green.description: Tionants are the scourge of Obsidia. In ancient times, these creatures terrorized the entire planet, the ancient Obsidia humans worshiped them as gods, but several thousand years ago they disappeared without a trace... But suddenly, a hundred years ago, these creatures again declared themselves. Continuing their terror on the planet. The reason for their disappearance and reappearance is not yet clear, since the Tionantes are very difficult to study.\n\nBut despite all this, Tionants have one useful feature. Green Tionants produce a nutritious vegetable jelly with their bodies.
LanguageData.OE_Tionant_Green.tools.left_claw.label: left claw
LanguageData.OE_Tionant_Green.tools.right_claw.label: right claw
LanguageData.OE_Tionant_Green.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.OE_Tionant_Red.label: tionant (red)
LanguageData.OE_Tionant_Red.description: Tionants are the scourge of Obsidia. In ancient times, these creatures terrorized the entire planet, the ancient Obsidia humans worshiped them as gods, but several thousand years ago they disappeared without a trace... But suddenly, a hundred years ago, these creatures again declared themselves. Continuing their terror on the planet. The reason for their disappearance and reappearance is not yet clear, since the Tionantes are very difficult to study.\n\nBut despite all this, Tionants have one useful feature. Red Tionantes produce nutritious meat-based jelly with their bodies.
LanguageData.OE_Tionant_Red.tools.left_claw.label: left claw
LanguageData.OE_Tionant_Red.tools.right_claw.label: right claw
LanguageData.OE_Tionant_Red.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.OE_Tionant_Yellow.label: tionant (yellow)
LanguageData.OE_Tionant_Yellow.description: Tionants are the scourge of Obsidia. In ancient times, these creatures terrorized the entire planet, the ancient Obsidia humans worshiped them as gods, but several thousand years ago they disappeared without a trace... But suddenly, a hundred years ago, these creatures again declared themselves. Continuing their terror on the planet. The reason for their disappearance and reappearance is not yet clear, since the Tionantes are very difficult to study.\n\nBut despite all this, Tionants have one useful feature. Yellow Thionants produce a nutritious animal jelly with their bodies.
LanguageData.OE_Tionant_Yellow.tools.left_claw.label: left claw
LanguageData.OE_Tionant_Yellow.tools.right_claw.label: right claw
LanguageData.OE_Tionant_Yellow.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.OE_Astrinx.label: astrinx
LanguageData.OE_Astrinx.description: Obsidia Astrinx resembles a large domestic cat, that's what they can be. But it's very hard to tame them, because they are very fast and strong hunters.
LanguageData.OE_Astrinx.tools.left_claw.label: left claw
LanguageData.OE_Astrinx.tools.right_claw.label: right claw
LanguageData.OE_Astrinx.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.OE_Ogren.label: ogren
LanguageData.OE_Ogren.description: Obsidia Ogren are huge and very strong creatures. By themselves, they are not aggressive unless disturbed. Their strength allows them to carry huge loads, which makes them excellent pack animals.
LanguageData.OE_Ogren.tools.left_fist.label: left fist
LanguageData.OE_Ogren.tools.right_fist.label: right fist
LanguageData.OE_Ogren.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.OE_Bruul_Acid.label: Acid Bruul
LanguageData.OE_Bruul_Acid.description: Bruul is a genetically engineered creature similar to a cephalopod, the design was made using the genes of an unknown creature on Obsidia. Scientists planned to create a living weapon and they succeeded. Bruul is an excellent fighting unit, having the ability to secrete dangerous ink... However, their rather weak and fragile body, as the difficulty in taming and training them, didn't live up to expectations. All test samples had to be disposed of.\n\nThis specimen emits Acid ink.
LanguageData.OE_Bruul_Acid.tools.tentacle.label: tentacle
LanguageData.OE_Bruul_Acid.verbs.acid_inc.label: acid inc
LanguageData.Bullet_Bruul_Acid.label: acid inc

However, their rather weak and fragile body, as the difficulty in taming and training them, didn't live up to expectations. All test samples had to be disposed of.\n\nThis specimen emits Cryo ink.
LanguageData.OE_Bruul_Cryo.tools.tentacle.label: tentacle
LanguageData.OE_Bruul_Cryo.verbs.cryo_inc.label: cryo inc
LanguageData.Bullet_Bruul_Cryo.label: cryo inc

LanguageData.Bullet_Bruul_Fire.label: fire inc

However, their rather weak and fragile body, as the difficulty in taming and training them, didn't live up to expectations. All test samples had to be disposed of.\n\nThis specimen emits EMP ink.
LanguageData.OE_Bruul_EMP.tools.tentacle.label: tentacle
LanguageData.OE_Bruul_EMP.verbs.EMP_inc.label: EMP inc
LanguageData.Bullet_Bruul_EMP.label: EMP inc
LanguageData.OE_Arachna_Blue.label: tundra Arachna
LanguageData.OE_Arachna_Blue.description: Obsidia Arachna are huge arthropod. These strong and fast creatures prefer to form small hunting groups. They are very difficult to tame and almost impossible to train. Also, many are mistaken in thinking that Arachnas produce webs.\n\nTundra Arachna prefers cold climates.
LanguageData.OE_Arachna_Blue.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.OE_Arachna_Green.label: jungle Arachna
LanguageData.OE_Arachna_Green.description: Obsidia Arachna are huge arthropod. These strong and fast creatures prefer to form small hunting groups. They are very difficult to tame and almost impossible to train. Also, many are mistaken in thinking that Arachnas produce webs.\n\nJungle Arachna prefers temperate climates.
LanguageData.OE_Arachna_Green.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.OE_Arachna_Red.label: dune Arachna
LanguageData.OE_Arachna_Red.description: Obsidia Arachna are huge arthropod. These strong and fast creatures prefer to form small hunting groups. They are very difficult to tame and almost impossible to train. Also, many are mistaken in thinking that Arachnas produce webs.\n\nDune Arachna prefers hot climates.
LanguageData.OE_Arachna_Red.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.OE_Arachna_Yellow.label: swamp Arachna
LanguageData.OE_Arachna_Yellow.description: Obsidia Arachna are huge arthropod. These strong and fast creatures prefer to form small hunting groups. They are very difficult to tame and almost impossible to train. Also, many are mistaken in thinking that Arachnas produce webs.\n\nSwamp Arachna prefers temperate climates.
LanguageData.OE_Arachna_Yellow.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.OE_Arachna_Tox.label: waste Arachna
LanguageData.OE_Arachna_Tox.description: Obsidia Arachna are huge arthropod. These strong and fast creatures prefer to form small hunting groups. They are very difficult to tame and almost impossible to train. Also, many are mistaken in thinking that Arachnas produce webs.\n\nWaste Arachna prefers polluted areas.
LanguageData.OE_Arachna_Tox.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.OE_Caterpillar_Brown.label: obsidia caterpillar
LanguageData.OE_Caterpillar_Brown.description: Caterpillar is a genetically engineered creature. Scientists planned to create a small, peaceful creature that would serve as a convenient source of meat.\n\nThis specimen adapted to life at average temperatures.
LanguageData.OE_Caterpillar_Brown.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.OE_Caterpillar_Arctic.label: obsidia caterpillar
LanguageData.OE_Caterpillar_Arctic.description: Caterpillar is a genetically engineered creature. Scientists planned to create a small, peaceful creature that would serve as a convenient source of meat.\n\nThis specimen adapted to life at cold temperatures.
LanguageData.OE_Caterpillar_Arctic.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.OE_Caterpillar_Desert.label: obsidia caterpillar
LanguageData.OE_Caterpillar_Desert.description: Caterpillar is a genetically engineered creature. Scientists planned to create a small, peaceful creature that would serve as a convenient source of meat.\n\nThis specimen adapted to life at hot temperatures.
LanguageData.OE_Caterpillar_Desert.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.OE_Caterpillar_Tox.label: obsidia tox caterpillar
LanguageData.OE_Caterpillar_Tox.description: Caterpillar is a genetically engineered creature. Scientists planned to create a small, peaceful creature that would serve as a convenient source of meat.\n\nThis specimen adapted to life at pollution areas.
LanguageData.OE_Caterpillar_Tox.tools.mandibles.label: mandibles
LanguageData.OE_Caterpillar_Tox.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.OE_Snapper.label: snapper
LanguageData.OE_Snapper.description: A medium sized obsidia crab species. A very calm creature. But on the planet Obsidia, they are considered pests due to their high reproduction rate.
LanguageData.OE_Snapper.tools.claw.label: claw
LanguageData.OE_Snapper.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.OE_Hootie.label: hootie
LanguageData.OE_Hootie.description: A beautiful medium unmodified Obsidia bird species. It is easily angered.
LanguageData.OE_Hootie.tools.claws.label: claws
LanguageData.OE_Hootie.tools.beak.label: beak
LanguageData.OE_Hootie.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.OE_Rosner.label: rosner
LanguageData.OE_Rosner.description: An Obsidia giant mammal with giant horn, domesticated in ancient times for fur, meat and milk. Rosner are peaceful creatures that can be tamed. But at the same time, they are very easy to enrage if you attack them. Once angered, its massive strength and sharp horn make it a brutal opponent.
LanguageData.OE_Rosner.tools.horn.label: horn
LanguageData.OE_Rosner.tools.left_foot.label: left foot
LanguageData.OE_Rosner.tools.right_foot.label: right foot
LanguageData.OE_Scorpid_Red.label: red scorpid
LanguageData.OE_Scorpid_Red.description: One of the oldest creatures of Obsidia. Scorpid is a huge insectoid with a durable chitinous shell, powerful claws and a poisonous sting.\n\nThis specimen adapted to life at hot temperatures.
LanguageData.OE_Scorpid_Red.tools.left_claw.label: left claw
LanguageData.OE_Scorpid_Red.tools.right_claw.label: right claw
LanguageData.OE_Scorpid_Red.tools.sting.label: sting
LanguageData.OE_Scorpid_Red.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.OE_Scorpid_Blue.label: blue scorpid
LanguageData.OE_Scorpid_Blue.description: One of the oldest creatures of Obsidia. Scorpid is a huge insectoid with a durable chitinous shell, powerful claws and a poisonous sting.\n\nThis specimen adapted to life at cold temperatures.
LanguageData.OE_Scorpid_Blue.tools.left_claw.label: left claw
LanguageData.OE_Scorpid_Blue.tools.right_claw.label: right claw
LanguageData.OE_Scorpid_Blue.tools.sting.label: sting
LanguageData.OE_Scorpid_Blue.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.OE_Scorpid_Tox.label: waste scorpid
LanguageData.OE_Scorpid_Tox.description: One of the oldest creatures of Obsidia. Scorpid is a huge insectoid with a durable chitinous shell, powerful claws and a poisonous sting.\n\nThis specimen adapted to life at pollution areas.
LanguageData.OE_Scorpid_Tox.tools.left_claw.label: left claw
LanguageData.OE_Scorpid_Tox.tools.right_claw.label: right claw
LanguageData.OE_Scorpid_Tox.tools.sting.label: sting
LanguageData.OE_Scorpid_Tox.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.OE_Sharkaradon.label: sharkaradon
LanguageData.OE_Sharkaradon.description: A large genetically-modified shark. The ancestors of these creatures were sea predators, but during the course of evolution they came to land, which led to their evolution as land predators. This species was genetically-modified by Obsidia scientists. They were made more faster and agile, but to do this they had to reduce their body size and life expectancy.
LanguageData.OE_Sharkaradon.tools.left_claws.label: left claws
LanguageData.OE_Sharkaradon.tools.right_claws.label: right claws
LanguageData.OE_Sharkaradon.tools.head.label: head
